verses.name: Luke 10:23
verses.text: And he turned him unto his disciples, and said privately, Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see:

verses.name: Luke 10:24
verses.text: For I tell you, that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.

verses.name: Luke 10:25
verses.text: And, behold, a certain lawyer stood up, and tempted him, saying, Master, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?

verses.name: Luke 10:26
verses.text: He said unto him, What is written in the law? how readest thou?
